mapper.sql: id as id , token as token , name as name , icon as icon , provinceId as provinceId , cityId as cityId , countyId as countyId , schoolName as schoolName , birthdayDate as birthdayDate , sex as sex , subjectType as subjectType , mail as mail , qq as qq
mapper.insert:
INSERT INTO zgk_user_info ( token, name, icon, provinceId, cityId, countyId, schoolName, birthdayDate, sex, subjectType, mail, qq ) VALUES ( #{token}, #{name}, #{icon}, #{provinceId}, #{cityId}, #{countyId}, #{schoolName}, #{birthdayDate}, #{sex}, #{subjectType}, #{mail}, #{qq} )
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS ID
mapper.update:
UPDATE zgk_user_info
token = #{token},
name = #{name},
icon = #{icon},
provinceId = #{provinceId},
cityId = #{cityId},
countyId = #{countyId},
schoolName = #{schoolName},
birthdayDate = #{birthdayDate},
sex = #{sex},
subjectType = #{subjectType},
mail = #{mail},
qq = #{qq},
WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE zgk_user_info
token = #{map.token},
name = #{map.name},
icon = #{map.icon},
provinceId = #{map.provinceId},
cityId = #{map.cityId},
countyId = #{map.countyId},
schoolName = #{map.schoolName},
birthdayDate = #{map.birthdayDate},
sex = #{map.sex},
subjectType = #{map.subjectType},
mail = #{map.mail},
qq = #{map.qq},
WHERE id = #{map.id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO zgk_user_info ( token, name, icon, provinceId, cityId, countyId, schoolName, birthdayDate, sex, subjectType, mail, qq ) VALUES ( #{map.token}, #{map.name}, #{map.icon}, #{map.provinceId}, #{map.cityId}, #{map.countyId}, #{map.schoolName}, #{map.birthdayDate}, #{map.sex}, #{map.subjectType}, #{map.mail}, #{map.qq} )
mapper.select:
SELECT
FROM zgk_user_info
AND id like CONCAT('%', #{condition.id} , '%')
AND token like CONCAT('%', #{condition.token} , '%')
AND name like CONCAT('%', #{condition.name} , '%')
AND icon like CONCAT('%', #{condition.icon} , '%')
AND provinceId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.provinceId} , '%')
AND cityId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.cityId} , '%')
AND countyId like CONCAT('%', #{condition.countyId} , '%')
AND schoolName like CONCAT('%', #{condition.schoolName} , '%')
AND birthdayDate like CONCAT('%', #{condition.birthdayDate} , '%')
AND sex like CONCAT('%', #{condition.sex} , '%')
AND subjectType like CONCAT('%', #{condition.subjectType} , '%')
AND mail like CONCAT('%', #{condition.mail} , '%')
AND qq like CONCAT('%', #{condition.qq} , '%')
ORDER BY ${orderBy} ${sortBy}
